interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Catrice | SUNGASM Luminizing Bronzer 01 | For A Sun-Kissed Shimmery Finish | Highly Pigmented & Blendable | Vegan, Paraben Free, Oil Free | Cruelty Free
Review Date: 2020/08/06
Store: Catrice
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Brand': 'Catrice', 'Color': 'C01 Golden Ecstasy', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Product Dimensions': '2.72 x 2.72 x 0.51 inches; 1.27 Ounces'}
Review Text: This bronzer is really pretty, it's not matte but not glittery. It has the perfect amount of shimmer/sheen that makes your skin look healthy and glowy. Perfect for summer. It blends out beautifully on my skin and looks like I have a natural tan. I have fair skin and the 01 shade doesn't pull too orange or too red on me.
Review Title: So beautiful!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
N3 No Name Necessary Mattifying Shine and Oil Control Long Lasting Anti-aging Makeup Setting Spray (200ml)
No Name Necessary
{'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.7 x 7.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
This spray feels slightly like hairspray when you spritz it on. It helps makeup last all day and stay matte. I personally like a dewy finish so I spray this first for longevity, then when it dries I’ll spray a little dewy spray. Love the combo! Comes in a huge bottle that will last forever.
Good spray for oily skin

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Makeup Preferences**: Prioritizes long-lasting makeup solutions with an emphasis on controlling shine and oil while also appreciating products that enhance a healthy glow.
- **Skin Type**: Likely has oily skin, indicated by the need for mattifying effects, yet is open to using products with shimmery finishes that can brighten the complexion.
- **Finish Preference**: Enjoys a dewy finish but is also drawn to products that add a sun-kissed, shimmery effect, showing flexibility in achieving varied looks depending on the season.
- **Product Packaging**: Values larger product sizes for longevity and cost-effectiveness.
- **Review Behavior**: Provides constructive and balanced reviews, demonstrating a pragmatic approach to product evaluations, and now highlights a strong appreciation for quality shimmery finishes that enhance natural beauty.
- **Usage Technique**: Employs a combination of products and blends them well, indicating a willingness to experiment with different textures and finishes for optimal results while achieving a more natural, radiant appearance.

This update reflects the user's recent positive experience with a bronzer product, emphasizing their ability to balance dewy and shimmery finishes in their makeup routine.
